readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://eucaly-tw5.tiddlyspot.com/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://eucaly-tw5.tiddlyspot.com/"/> !![[FlexWidth Plugin|$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/readme]]
This ''FlexWidth'' plugin provides a handy machenism to ''flexibly tweak sidebar width'' for [[TiddlyWiki 5|http://tiddlywiki.com/]]. !!!Features # Add extra buttons next to system ~TopRightBar Icon, such as - `▼` `◀` {{$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu}} # `◀` / `▶` to toggle between default and custom sidebar width. # `▼` to select different sidebar width.

** Inspired by [[TW5 tristate Sidebar|http://tw5tristate.tiddlyspot.com/]]

!!!Install * Drag&Drop package -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth]] (with documentation)
